    • 类draw3.Info扩展javax.swing.JPanel实现可序列化

      serialVersionUID:
      1613122995840716063L

      • 序列化字段

        • string

          java.lang.String string
          The string is to save the random generating words

        • words

          java.lang.String[] words
          The words is to save all the text's words

        • random

          java.util.Random random
          The random is to generate random words from the String[] words

        • w

          java.lang.String w
          The w is to save the string and is used for the main frame

    • 类draw3.PenModel扩展java.lang.Object实现可序列化

      serialVersionUID:
      8101788343605262320L

      • 序列化字段

        • penSize

          float penSize
          The penSize is to save the pen's size and its default value is 5.0f

        • penColor

          java.awt.Color penColor
          The penColor is to save the pen's color and its default color is black

        • ox

          int ox
          The ox, oy, x, y are the positions of(ox,oy) and (x,y),respectively

        • oy

          int oy
          The ox, oy, x, y are the positions of(ox,oy) and (x,y),respectively

        • x

          int x
          The ox, oy, x, y are the positions of(ox,oy) and (x,y),respectively

        • y

          int y
          The ox, oy, x, y are the positions of(ox,oy) and (x,y),respectively

        • words

          java.lang.String words
          The words is to save the actual words to be guessed and its default value is "hey"

        • guess

          java.lang.String guess
          The guess is to save the guessing word its default value is "man"

        • actionListenerList

          java.util.ArrayList<E> actionListenerList
          The actionListenerList is to save all the actions that change the model and notify the controller to draw the view
